casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph Edward BROMFIELD. No. 483P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of September 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
